1.0.0.name: connect20/Customer_Cancel_Order_From_My_Account
1.0.0.description: Customer order cancel from my account is an open-source Magento module developed by Commerce Bees. The primary focus of the module is used to cancel the order from my account page by the users.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
